page.title: 19Transport,Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: For one week we went to the centre of the village.At the cross roads there are 4 directions:Selby,Cawood,Leeds and Tadcaster.This is a survey of traffic that went through Sherburn. 573 vehicles on the Selby road. A quarter haulage,half cars,and a quarter two-wheeled vehicles,public service and agricultural vehicles.339 went towards Leeds.One third cars and two thirds public transport, public service, agricultural and haulage traffic.712 went towards Tadcaster. Three quarters were cars and a quarter mixed traffic.381 went towards Cawood. Two thirds cars and one third mixed traffic.The busiest time is between 1.40 and 2.00.The quietest time is 9.00 to 9.20.The result of the survey {was 1374 cars,543 lorries,20 public {transport,18 agricultural vehicles,7 {public service and 47 two-wheelers.
